 2018-16102018-12-14,  ,  ,  FIN, 
ActCustoms Tariff
SubjectIn-Transit Steel Goods Remission Order
PrecisIN-TRANSIT STEEL GOODS REMISSION ORDER in order to (1) provide relief from provisional safeguards for subject steel imports that were in transit before October 25, 2018 in order to mitigate unintended impacts on steel importers and users; and, (2) preserve the effectiveness of Canadaâ€™s provisional safeguards in preventing excessive imports of subject steel products from causing, or threatening to cause, serious injury to domestic producers.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0288 Publication Date: 2018-12-26
